name: Wallet Up Checkout for WPForms
author: Wallet Up

sections.description:
This plugin helps you load Wallet Up P2P payments methods directly into WPForms Templates. Wallet Up and WPForms plugins are REQUIRED to be activated.
WPForms premium version may be required for some functionalities.

What is Wallet Up Checkout for WPForms?

Wallet Up Checkout for WPForms helps you integrate directly the Wallet Up P2P payments methods into WPForms. It is a Trademark of Wallet UP LLC.

Features

  • Accepts one-off donations or funds via Cash App
  • Accepts one-off donations or funds via Paypal.me
  • Accepts one-off donations or funds via Zelle
  • Accepts one-off donations or funds via Venmo
  • Accepts one-off donations or funds via Facebook Pay
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.8 or greater
  • Wallet Up 3.0.0 or greater
  • WPForms 1.7.0 or greater
  • PHP version 5.6 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0.15 or greater
  • cURL version 5.40 or higher
  • An SSL certificate

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of “WalUp” or “Wallet Up”, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click “Add New”.

In the search field type “WalUp” or “Wallet Up” and click Search Plugins. Once you have found the plugin you can view details about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our wallet plugin and uploading it to your server via your favorite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
sections.faq:
After activation go to WPForms >> Templates >> Customs Templates >> and Select Wallet Up Payment. Visit https://bit.ly/3hCfYli for a demo.

Find more on www.walletup.app

What do we support?

Now Wallet Up Checkout for WPForms plugin supports Cash App, Venmo, PayPal, Zelle and Facebook Pay integration into WPForms Template.
More are coming soon.
sections.changelog:
1.0.5 February 16, 2024

  • Compatibility: Compatible to WP 6.6 and Latest WP Forms

1.0.4 March 3, 2023

  • Compatibility: Compatible to WP 6.2 and Latest WP Forms

1.0.3 March 3, 2023

  • Fixed: Update plugin in Admin Dashboard failure

1.0.2 March 3, 2023

  • minor fixes

1.0.1 March 3, 2023

  • Bug: Fixed conditional trigger on template payment processing
  • Tweak: Template improvement

1.0.0 November 9, 2022

  • Initial Public Release

  • Supports:
    WPForms Templates
    Cash App
    Venmo
    Paypal
    Facebook Pay

upgrade_notice: Automatic updates should work smoothly; as always though, ensure you backup your site just in case.
